Lunge.Effect: Deal light physical damage to 1 foe.

Ayamur.Effect: Deal medium physical damage to 1 foe 3x with high accuracy. Unique to Baal.

Myriad Slashes.Effect: Deal medium physical damage to 1 foe 2x to 3x.

Lucky Punch.Effect: Deal minuscule physical damage to 1 foe. High critical rate.

Cross Slash.Effect: Deal heavy physical damage to 1 foe 2 times. High accuracy. Unique to Izanagi.

Hassou Tobi.Effect: Deal light physical damage to all foes 8 times. Unique to Yoshitsune.

Mamudoon.Effect: medium chance of instantly killing all foes.

Foul Breath.Effect: Increase susceptibility to all ailments of 1 foe.

Stagnant Air.Effect: Increase susceptibility to all ailments of all foes and allies.

Ghastly Wail.Effect: Instantly kill all foes under Fear.

Black Viper.Effect: Deal severe Almighty damage to 1 foe. Unique to Satan.

Morning Star.Effect: Deal severe Almighty damage to all foes. Unique to Lucifer.

Door of Hades.Effect: Deal heavy Almighty damage to all foes with medium chance of instant kill. Unique to Thanatos and Thanatos Picaro.

Abyssal Gaze.Effect: Deal severe Almighty damage to all foes. Unique to Hastur.

Blade of Rebellion.Effect: Deal severe Almighty damage to 1 foe. Extra effectiveness against an enemy that is down. Unique to ??.

Unshaken Will.Effect: Impart immunity against all psychological ailments.

Sharp Student.Effect: Lower odds of receiving critical hit.

Firm Stance.Effect: Half all incoming damage by sacrificing evasion completely.

Dodge Physical.Effect: Double evasion rate against Phys attacks.

Dodge Fire.Effect: Double evasion rate against Fire (Agi) attacks.

Dodge Ice.Effect: Double evasion rate against Ice (Bufu) attacks.

Dodge Electric.Effect: Double evasion rate against Electric (Zio) attacks.

Dodge Wind.Effect: Double evasion rate against Wind (Garu) attacks.

Dodge Psi.Effect: Double evasion rate against Psi attacks.

Dodge Nuclear.Effect: Double evasion rate against Nuclear (Frei) attacks.

Dodge Light.Effect: Double evasion rate against (non instant death) Light (Kou) attacks.

Dodge Curse.Effect: Double evasion rate against (non instant death) Curse (Ei) attacks.

Evade Physical.Effect: Triple evasion rate against Phys attacks.

Evade Fire.Effect: Triple evasion rate against Fire (Agi) attacks.

Evade Ice.Effect: Triple evasion rate against Ice (Bufu) attacks.

Evade Electric.Effect: Triple evasion rate against Electric (Zio) attacks.

Evade Wind.Effect: Triple evasion rate against Wind (Garu) attacks.

Evade Psi.Effect: Triple evasion rate against Psi attacks.

Evade Nuclear.Effect: Triple evasion rate against Nuclear (Frei) attacks.

Evade Light.Effect: Triple evasion rate against (non instant death) Light (Kou) attacks.

Evade Curse.Effect: Triple evasion rate against (non instant death) Curse (Ei) attacks.

Angelic Grace.Effect: Double evasion rate against all attacks except Bless/Curseness/Almighty.

Rainy Play.Effect: Greatly increase evasion under rainy day or special weather warning.

Ali Dance.Effect: Half hit rate of all incoming attacks.

Pressing Stance.Effect: Reduce hit rate by 2/3 of all incoming attack when being ambushed.

Bless Boost.Effect: Strengthen (non instant death) Bless (Kou) attacks by 25%.

Curse Boost.Effect: Strengthen (non instant death) Curse (Ei) attacks by 25%.

Light Amp.Effect: Strengthen (non instant death) Light (Kou) attacks by 50%.

Curse Amp.Effect: Strengthen (non instant death) Curse (Ei) attacks by 50%.

Hama Boost.Effect: Increase success rate of instant death by Bless skills.

Mudo Boost.Effect: Increase success rate of instant death by Curse skills.

Ailment Boost.Effect: Increase chance of inflicting all ailments.

Brooding Sky.Effect: Greatly increase inflicting rate of all status effects under rainy day or special weather warning.

Crisis Resolve.Effect: Increase critical rate when being ambushed.

Touch and Go.Effect: Apply Sukukaja when performing Baton Pass.

Arms Master.Effect: Half HP cost for physical skills.

Spell Master.Effect: Half SP cost for magic skills.

Trigger Happy.Effect: Increase critical rate of Gun attacks.

High Voltage.Effect: Increase critical rate when beginning battle with preemptive turn.

Attack Lesson.Effect: Automatic Tarukaja at the start of battle.

Defense Lesson.Effect: Automatic Rakukaja at the start of battle.

Speed Lesson.Effect: Automatic Sukukaja at the start of battle.

Auto-Mataru.Effect: Automatic Matarukaja at the start of battle. (Overwrites Attack Lesson)

Auto-Maraku.Effect: Automatic Marakukaja at the start of battle. (Overwrites Defense Lesson)

Auto-Masuku.Effect: Automatic Masukukaja at the start of battle. (Overwrites Speed Lesson)

Heat Up.Effect: Recover 5% HP and 10 SP at the start of preemptive turn.

Endure.Effect: Survive one fatal blow with 1 HP remaining.

Survival Trick.Effect: Survive one instant death attack with 1 HP remaining.

Enduring Soul.Effect: Survive one fatal blow with HP completely recovered.

Growth 3.Effect: Persona gains full EXP even while inactive.

Regenerate 1.Effect: Restore 2% of max HP each turn in battle.

Regenerate 2.Effect: Recover 4% of max HP each turn in battle.

Regenerate 3.Effect: Recover 6% of max HP each turn in battle.

Invigorate 1.Effect: Recover 3 SP each turn in battle.

Invigorate 2.Effect: Recover 5 SP each turn in battle.

Invigorate 3.Effect: Recover 7 SP each turn in battle.

Fast Heal.Effect: Half the time needed to recover from ailments.

Insta-Heal.Effect: Recover from an ailment in 1 turn.

Divine Grace.Effect: Effects of healing magic are increased by 50%.

Soul Chain.Effect: Recover 20 SP when performing Baton Pass.

Tarukaja.Effect: Increase 1 ally's Attack power for 3 turns.

Heat Riser.Effect: Increase 1 ally's Attack Defense and Agility for 3 turns.

Matarukaja.Effect: Increase party's Attack power for 3 turns.

Thermopylae.Effect: Increase party's Attack Defense and Agility for 3 turns. Only usable if the party is being ambushed.

Champion's Oath.Effect: Restores 10 SP of 1 ally and increase their Attack power for 3 turns.*

Tarunda.Effect: Decrease 1 foe's Attack power for 3 turns.

Debilitate.Effect: Decrease 1 foe's Attack Defense and Agility for 3 turns.

Matarunda.Effect: Decrease all foes' Attack power for 3 turns.

Marakunda.Effect: Decrease all foes' Defense for 3 turns.

Masukunda.Effect: Decrease all foes' Agility for 3 turns.

Rebellion.Effect: Increase 1 ally's critical rate for 3 turns.

Revolution.Effect: Increase all foes and allies' critical rate for 3 turns.

Power Charge.Effect: Multiply user's next Phys attack damage by 2.5.

Mind Charge.Effect: Multiply user's next magical attack damage by 2.5.

Charge All.Effect: Multiply party's next Attack damage by 2.5x

Concentrate All.Effect: Multiply party's next Magic damage by 2.5x

Myriad Blooms.Effect: Increase all allies' Attack, Defense, and Agility for 3 turns

Checkmate.Effect: Decrease all foes' Attack, Defense, and Agility for 3 turns

False Painting.Effect: Absorbs all non-almighty attacks once and removes weakness.

Life Wall.Effect: Repels incoming non-almighty attack for all allies.

President Intuition.Effect: Applies Attack Master and Concentrate on one ally.

Fire Wall.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to reduce damage of Fire (Agi) attacks for 3 turns.

Ice Wall.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to reduce damage of Ice (Bufu) attacks for 3 turns.

Electric Wall.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to reduce damage of Electric (Zio) attacks for 3 turns.

Wind Wall.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to reduce damage of Wind attacks for 3 turns.

Psy Wall.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to reduce damage of Psy attacks for 3 turns.

Nuclear Wall.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to reduce damage of Nuclear (Frei) attacks for 3 turns.

Tetraja.Effect: Create shields on party to nullify one instant death attack of Bless (Kou) or Curse (Ei) types.

Tetrakarn.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to repel 1 Phys attack.

Makarakarn.Effect: Create a shield on 1 ally to repel 1 magical attack.

Dekaja.Effect: Negate all -kaja buff effects of all foes.

Dekunda.Effect: Negate all -nda debuff effects of party.

Agi Break.Effect: Negate Fire (Agi) resistances of all foes.

Bufu Break.Effect: Negate Ice (Bufu) resistances of all foes.

Zio Break.Effect: Negate Electric (Zio) resistances of all foes.

Garu Break.Effect: Negate Wind (Garu) resistances of all foes.

Psy Break.Effect: Negate Psy resistances of all foes.

Nuclear Break.Effect: Negate Nuclear (Frei) resistances of all foes.

Tetra Break.Effect: Remove physical-repellent shields from all foes.

Makara Break.Effect: Remove magic-repellent shields from all foes.

Samarecarm.Effect: Revives 1 ally with all HP recovered.

Recarmdora.Effect: Fully revives and recover party but user's HP drops to 1.

Salvation.Effect: Fully restores HP. Cures all ailments of party except for unique status.

Cadenza.Effect: Restores 50% HP of party and increase evasion rate. Unique to Orpheus and Orpheus Picaro.

Oratorio.Effect: Fully restores party's HP and negate all -nda debuffs. Unique to Messiah and Messiah Picaro.

Neo Cadenza.Effect: Restores 50% HP of party and increase attack, defense, and evasion rate. Unique Orpheus F and Orpheus F Picaro.

Saintly Devotion.Effect: Revives and fully restores HP of party. Unique to Maria. (P5R only)

High-speed Hacking.Effect: Restores 25% HP to all allies after Futaba's All Out Attack

Unstoppable Hacking.Effect: Restores 100% HP to all allies after Futaba's All Out Attack

Baisudi.Effect: Cures Burn, Freeze, or Shock of 1 ally.

Mabaisudi.Effect: Cures Burn, Freeze, or Shock of party.

Patra.Effect: Cures Dizzy, Forget, Sleep, or Hunger of 1 ally.

Me Patra.Effect: Cures Dizzy, Forget, Sleep, or Hunger of party.

Energy Drop.Effect: Cures Panic, Fear, Distress, Rage, or Brainwash of 1 ally.

Energy Shower.Effect: Cures Panic, Fear, Distress, Rage, or Brainwash of party.

Amrita Drop.Effect: Cures all ailments of 1 ally except for unique status.

Amrita Shower.Effect: Cures all ailments of party except for unique status.
